Subskills.name: Damascus Speartip
Subskills.description: Increases the damage dealt by rebound.

Subskills.name: Electrocharged Rebound
Subskills.description: Chance to strike targets with bolts of lightning on hit.

Subskills.name: Reaching Ricochet
Subskills.description: Increases the maximum range of rebound.

Subskills.name: Splitting Speartip
Subskills.description: Chance on hit for the rebound projectile to split into an additional rebound.

Subskills.name: Multi Rebound
Subskills.description: Increases the amount of rebounds from the initial hit. Damage is reduced.

Subskills.name: Accurate Spearshot
Subskills.description: Increases attack rating when using rebound.

Subskills.name: Increasing Odds
Subskills.description: Rebound gains additional crit damage on each bounce.

Subskills.name: Kickback Projectile
Subskills.description: Rebound projectiles now return to you instead of expiring dealing increased damage to monsters on its path.

Subskills.name: Penetrating Rebound
Subskills.description: Chance to lightning break on hit.

Subskills.name: Marksmanship
Subskills.description: Increases attack speed when using a bow with rebound.

Subskills.name: Rapidfly
Subskills.description: Increases the projectile speed of rebound.

Subskills.name: Rebomb
Subskills.description: Rebound now increases its damage and size with every bounce and explodes at the end dealing damage on a large radius.

Subskills.name: Orbital Rebound
Subskills.description: When hitting an enemy spawn the rebound projectile orbiting you until it hits a monster.
